org.eclipse.dataset.roi

Class RectangularROI

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.eclipse.dataset.roi.ROIBase
      • org.eclipse.dataset.roi.OrientableROIBase
        • org.eclipse.dataset.roi.RectangularROI
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, INameable, IOrientableROI, IRectangularROI, IROI
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    GridROI, PerimeterBoxROI, XAxisBoxROI, XAxisLineBoxROI, YAxisBoxROI, YAxisLineBoxROI

    public class RectangularROI
extends OrientableROIBase
implements IRectangularROI, java.io.Serializable
    Class for rectangular region of interest
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
